structured_info.description: Fairway Holdings is a home-grown Sri Lankan corporate, known for its dynamism and rapid growth, offering lifestyle-enhancing products and services. With a rich legacy in residential and commercial high-rise development dating back to 2004, Fairway Holdings has emerged as a trusted real estate developer dedicated to pushing design boundaries of urban vertical living and creating a lifestyle of luxury, sophistication, and convenience. They also have interests in Leisure, Financial Services, Waste Management, Aviation, Interior Solutions, and Biotechnology.
structured_info.company_address: Rajagiriya, Colombo metropolis, Sri Lanka

All_real_estate_projects.name: Fairway on the Waterfront
All_real_estate_projects.description: Our entry to the luxury vertical living market. This 21-storey luxury apartment complex comprises of 65 units, including spacious penthouses. The project was completed in November 2007. ICTAD, the entity responsible for assessing construction quality in Sri Lanka, awarded the project the Best Quality for Construction Excellence in 2008.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Fairmount Urban Oasis
All_real_estate_projects.description: Located in close proximity to the wetlands of Rajagiriya, offering its homeowners a close-to-nature living experience. This 31-storey luxury apartment complex comprising of 110 units was completed in May 2010. This project was awarded the prestigious ICTAD Construction Excellence Award in 2010.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Fairway Sky Gardens
All_real_estate_projects.description: Completed in November 2015, the 32 floor Fairway SkyGardens features 120 apartments, including penthouses inclusive of an infinity edge sky pool. This building boasts of a few firsts in Sri Lanka, with an actual garden towering in the sky and its very own helipad. It is a true icon of the ever-evolving modern trend in luxury vertical living.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Elements By Fairway
All_real_estate_projects.description: A 40 storey luxury apartment complex with 130 units split to 3, 4 bedroom apartments and penthouses, is situated overlooking the scenic Diyawanna Oya. All homeowners enjoy a unique terrace area which enables them to experience the pleasant natural background of the project’s location. The project was successfully completed in 2019.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Fairway Galle
All_real_estate_projects.description: Our first project out of Colombo is located in close proximity to the UNESCO world heritage site ‘The Galle Dutch Fort’. This resort-like luxury apartment project is the first of its kind in the South of the country and complements infrastructure development in Southern Sri Lanka. It’s in close vicinity to the Pinnaduwa exit on the Southern expressway. Completed in 2018, consisting of 14 floors, and 220 apartments of 2, 3 bedroom configurations and penthouses, Fairway Galle offers its homeowners their own stake in this historic city.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Urban Homes Koswatta
All_real_estate_projects.description: Located in the metropolis of Battaramulla, Urban Homes Koswatta is a 20 storey apartment consisting of 250 apartment units in close proximity to the proposed developments like the Monorail project, and Malabe-to-Fort highway project, which makes it a sought-after location.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Latitude By Fairway
All_real_estate_projects.description: Centrally located in the heart of Colombo 5 with easy access to schools, hospitals, supermarkets, restaurants and retailers, Latitude by Fairway offers absolute convenience to its apartment homeowners. Consisting of 135 apartment units across 22 floors, it also features a roof top terrace and an infinity pool. Construction is due to be completed in 2021.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Aqua Vista
All_real_estate_projects.description: Our second development in Galle, Aqua Vista by Fairway is located on a clifftop overlooking the blue ocean on one side and UNESCO world heritage site, the Galle Dutch Fort on the other. This 20 storey luxury apartment complex will consist of 140 apartments in 2 and 3 bedroom configurations, including penthouses and is due to be completed in 2022.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Olcott Tower
All_real_estate_projects.description: Located in the heart of the Central Business District of Colombo, Olcott Tower by Fairway stands within 1 minute’s walk to the proposed Multimodal Transport Hub, a 3 minutes drive to the World Trade Center, and a 6 minutes drive to the Port City development. Olcott Tower by Fairway will consist of 280 apartments and will be one of the most desired investments due to its location, which offers a convenient lifestyle to its homeowners, and a substantial return on property appreciation and rentability.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Fairway Kurunegala
All_real_estate_projects.description: Kurunegala, is a fast developing city and is an essential hub for transport and trade due to the upcoming Central Expressway development. Fairway Kurunegala is a mixed development comprising of both commercial and residential spaces with a 180 apartment complex, retail outlets and features such as supermarkets and banks. The location of this project is a stand out with the picturesque Kurunegala lake on one side and the legendary Elephant Rock on the other.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Lighthouse Cliff by Fairway
All_real_estate_projects.description: Located on the southernmost tip of Sri Lanka, Dondra, Lighthouse Cliff by Fairway will offer 80 luxurious apartments overlooking the Dondra lighthouse and magnificent views of the ocean. The rising demand of this unique locality paves way for steady property appreciation, and inevitably forges Lighthouse Cliff by Fairway to be one of the most sought-after properties for luxury living in the South of Sri Lanka.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Elan by Fairway
All_real_estate_projects.description: A 105 unit proposed project is located in Nawala, one of the most sought-after suburbs in Colombo. Overlooking the wetlands and in close proximity to the city, it gives its homeowners the best of both worlds by being close to nature as well as the city life.

All_real_estate_projects.name: Fairway Nuwara Eliya
All_real_estate_projects.description: The proposed 60 apartment development project, overlooking the renowned Nuwara Eliya Golf Course will be of specific appeal to those looking to own a holiday home in the hills.

current_and_future_real_estate_projects.description: Located in the metropolis of Battaramulla, Urban Homes Koswatta is a 20 storey apartment consisting of 250 apartment units in close proximity to the proposed developments like the Monorail project, and Malabe-to-Fort highway project, which makes it a sought-after location.

With innovation at our core, we design living and working environments that reflect modern aspirations, offering our patrons not just homes, but meaningful lifestyles. structured_info.description: A synonym for quality, speed and care, Maga Engineering is one of the most trusted construction companies in South Asia, delivering high-quality buildings and infrastructure for over three decades. From concept to conclusion, Maga continues to work with an array of stakeholders from investors and developers to public agencies and regional communities. As the largest construction company in Sri Lanka, its work has enriched all sectors of the economy, from healthcare and hospitality to transport and water supply. In bringing to life over 500 multi-disciplinary projects, Maga has set global benchmarks in project delivery and sustainability, from completing one of the fastest Tsunami rehabilitation projects, to building the world’s tallest vertical garden and the first LEED Platinum apparel factory. The company is anchored by an extensive resource base and driven by a dynamic workforce of over 10,500. Centered on an unwavering vision for sustainable development, Maga is helping reshape the evolving landscapes around us.

structured_info.description: Colombo Land and Development Company (CLDC) PLC is a pioneer in mixed development projects in the real estate and retail industry in Sri Lanka. Incorporated as a limited company on 8th December 1981 and listed on the Colombo Stock Exchange on 19th March 1986, its principal activities are the development and leasing out of investment property under operating leases at Liberty Plaza and renting of vehicle car parks at both Liberty Plaza and Pettah locations. The Group also holds commercial space unmatched in terms of strategic location and land extent in the Central Business District of Pettah, which has been earmarked for ambitious development. Its fully owned subsidiary, Agri Spice (Pvt) Ltd., operates a 102-acre Mahogany, Rubber and Alstoniya plantation at Avissawella, reflecting its commitment to sustainable development through investments in environment-friendly sectors.
